meanings.definition: The introductory section of a news article.
meanings.sent1: The lede of the article summarized the main points.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to grab the reader's attention with an engaging lede.
meanings.sent3: The lede was so captivating that everyone wanted to read more.
meanings.sent4: Her lede was like a bright light in the darkness of the news.
meanings.sent5: The journalist crafted a powerful lede that stayed with the readers.

meanings.sent1: She will lede the team to victory with her strong leadership.
meanings.sent2: Please lede us to the correct path through the forest.
meanings.sent3: He tried to lede the group, but they ended up getting lost.
meanings.sent4: Her determination lede her to success against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The coach's encouragement lede the team to triumph.

meanings.sent1: The artist used lede to create a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent2: Lede is known for its durability and strength.
meanings.sent3: The lede in the artwork added a unique touch to the design.
meanings.sent4: The lede in the construction held the structure together.
meanings.sent5: The shiny lede reflected the sunlight brilliantly.
